kty.description: The key type, which is always 'EC' for Elliptic Curve keys.

crv.description: The algorithm intended for use with the key, such as 'ES256'.

x.description: The x coordinate of the EC public key.

y.description: The y coordinate of the EC public key.

keys.description: An array of EC public keys in JWK format.

id.description: The unique identifier for the tenant.

status.description: The current status of the tenant.

clients.description: The clients associated with the tenant.

clientId.description: The unique identifier for the client.

secret.description: The secret key for the client.

tenantId.description: The unique identifier for the tenant that the client belongs to. Only null for accounts that manage tenants, that do not belong to a client

roles.description: The roles assigned to the client.

tenant.description: The tenant that the client belongs to.

id.description: The unique identifier for the tenant.

roles.description: The roles assigned to the client.

clientId.description: The unique identifier for the client.

roles.description: The roles assigned to the client.

tenant.description: The tenant that owns this object.

type.description: Type of the certificate (access or signing).

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the VP request was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the VP request was last updated.

privateKey.description: The private key in JWK format.

type.description: The type of authentication used for the webhook.

headerName.description: The name of the header where the API key will be sent.

value.description: The value of the API key to be sent in the header.

type.description: The type of authentication used for the webhook.

config.description:
Configuration for API key authentication.
This is required if the type is 'apiKey'.

auth.description:
Optional authentication configuration for the webhook.
If not provided, no authentication will be used.

url.description: The URL to which the webhook will send notifications.

response_type.description: The type of response expected from the presentation request.

webhook.description:
Webhook configuration to receive the response.
If not provided, the configured webhook from the configuration will be used.

redirectUri.description: Optional redirect URI to which the user-agent should be redirected after the presentation is completed.

id.description: Identifier of the registration certificate that got issued.

body.description: The body of the registration certificate request containing the necessary details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the VP request.

tenant.description: The tenant that owns this object.

lifeTime.description: Lifetime how long the presentation request is valid after creation, in seconds.

dcql_query.description: The DCQL query to be used for the VP request.

registrationCert.description: The registration certificate request containing the necessary details.

webhook.description: Optional webhook URL to receive the response.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the VP request was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the VP request was last updated.

redirectUri.description: Redirect URI to which the user-agent should be redirected after the presentation is completed.

id.description: Unique identifier for the VP request.

lifeTime.description: Lifetime how long the presentation request is valid after creation, in seconds.

dcql_query.description: The DCQL query to be used for the VP request.

registrationCert.description: The registration certificate request containing the necessary details.

webhook.description: Optional webhook URL to receive the response.

redirectUri.description: Redirect URI to which the user-agent should be redirected after the presentation is completed.

response_type.description: The type of response expected for the offer request.

claims.description: Override the default values for the credential claims.

flow.description: The flow type for the offer request.

tx_code.description: Transaction code for pre-authorized code flow.

credentialConfigurationIds.description: List of credential configuration ids to be included in the offer.

claimWebhook.description: Webhooks to fetch the claims dynamically.

notifyWebhook.description: Webhook to notify about the status of the issuance process.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the request was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the request was last updated.

expiresAt.description: The timestamp when the request is set to expire.

useDcApi.description: Flag indicating whether to use the DC API for the presentation request.

tenant.description: The tenant that owns this object.

request_uri.description: Request URI from the authorization request.

auth_queries.description: Authorization queries associated with the session.

nonce.description: Nonce used for the OID4VCI flow.

offer.description: Credential offer object containing details about the credential offer or presentation request.

offerUrl.description: Offer URL for the credential offer.

credentialPayload.description: Credential payload containing the offer request details.

claimsWebhook.description: Webhook configuration to send result and may receive further information.

notifyWebhook.description: Webhook configuration to send the result of the notification response.

requestUrl.description: The URL of the presentation auth request.

credentials.description: Verified credentials from the presentation process.

vp_nonce.description: Noncce from the Verifiable Presentation request.

redirectUri.description: Redirect URI to which the user-agent should be redirected after the presentation is completed.

response.description: The response string containing the authorization details.

sendResponse.description: When set to true, the authorization response will be sent to the client.

sessionId.description: The session ID of the user

credentialConfigurationId.description:
The ID of the credential configuration
This is optional, if not provided, all credentials will be revoked of the session.

status.description:
The status of the credential
0 = valid, 1 = revoked, 2 = suspended

request_uri.description: The request URI for the Pushed Authorization Request.

expires_in.description: The expiration time for the request URI in seconds.

embeddedDisclosurePolicy.description:
Embedded disclosure policy (discriminated union by `policy`).
The discriminator makes class-transformer instantiate the right subclass,
and then class-validator runs that subclasss rules.

tenant.description: The tenant that owns this object.

claimsWebhook.description: Webhook to receive claims for the issuance process.

notificationWebhook.description: Webhook to receive claims for the issuance process.

embeddedDisclosurePolicy.description:
Embedded disclosure policy (discriminated union by `policy`).
The discriminator makes class-transformer instantiate the right subclass,
and then class-validator runs that subclasss rules.

claimsWebhook.description: Webhook to receive claims for the issuance process.

notificationWebhook.description: Webhook to receive claims for the issuance process.

url.description:
The URL used in the OID4VCI authorized code flow.
This URL is where users will be redirected for authentication.

webhook.description: Optional webhook configuration for authentication callbacks

type.description: Link to the presentation configuration that is relevant for the issuance process

tenant.description: The tenant that owns this object.

authServers.description: Authentication server URL for the issuance process.

notifyWebhook.description: Webhook to send the result of the notification response

batchSize.description:
Value to determine the amount of credentials that are issued in a batch.
Default is 1.

dPopRequired.description: Indicates whether DPoP is required for the issuance process. Default value is true.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the VP request was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the VP request was last updated.

authServers.description: Authentication server URL for the issuance process.

notifyWebhook.description: Webhook to send the result of the notification response

batchSize.description:
Value to determine the amount of credentials that are issued in a batch.
Default is 1.

dPopRequired.description: Indicates whether DPoP is required for the issuance process. Default value is true.
